block_comment: This block of code initializes and assigns values to a set of variables related to a 'phase-locked loop' control system, specifically for an index of 2. The assigned values indicate a condition where the loop is in locked phase and there are no overflows or out-of-range values. All counters are reset to zero and the control command 'mcGo_w' is set to 1, implying readiness for operation. Despite initialising 'pi_dqs_found_all_w' and 'pi_dqs_found_w' to true, 'pi_dqs_found_any_w' is set to false, suggesting a certain logic specific to the design of this system.
